titleStmt.title: Touching the subject of supremacy in causes ecclesiastical. Diatriba quædam Oxoniensis cujusdam. Tending to peace and setling, by shewing how the powers civil and ecclesiastical may act in their own sphæres without incroachment on one another. July 12. 1647. Imprimatur John Downame.
titleStmt.author: Geree, John, 1601?-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.F. for Philemon Stephens,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Geree by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
